analyzed: bdag 'khor ba na 'khor ba'i tshe sdug bsngal gang ci yang myong ba de sems can thams cad mnyam pa nyid du mi shes pa'i mtshan nyid du ma gyur cig /
translated: Whatever suffering I experience while wandering in samsara, may it not be characterized by my ignorance of the sameness of all sentient beings.

original: bdag gis 'jig rten pa'i phun sum tshogs pa'i bde ba gang ci yang myong ba de sems can thams cad dang thun mong du yongs su spyod par gyur cig /
analyzed: bdag gis 'jig rten pa'i phun sum tshogs pa'i bde ba gang ci yang myong ba de sems can thams cad dang thun mong du yongs su spyod par gyur cig /

translated: Whatever nonvirtuous actions I have done,

original: so sor bshags pa bla na med pas so sor ma bshags par ma gyur cig /
analyzed: so sor bshags pa bla na med pas so sor ma bshags par ma gyur cig /

analyzed: bdag la bdud kyi las gang dag yod pa de dag yongs su shes pa bla na med pas dngos su mi shes par ma gyur cig /
